mapper.sql: id, userid, apply_id, batch_id, createdtime, attach_note, attach_type, attachment, attachurl
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) from (select apply_id,attach_type from bt_user_attacht WHERE apply_id=#{applyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND attach_type != -1 GROUP BY attach_type) cc
mapper.insert:

update bt_user_attacht

apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
